detail: Developing EcoQuest, a sustainability platform that helps young people build eco-friendly habits through challenge-based engagement.

organization: Geospatial Technologies Research Group, James I University, Spain
detail: Developed research prototype tools such as Space4Geo resources catalogue (Angular), automated course metadata extractor from GitHub repositories (Python) and other with mentorship from Prof. Sven Castelyen and Marc Pardo Fernández.
Developed an open-source digital hub (using Astro, React) for the Nepalese climate community by interviewing students, founders, and activists; later grew it into a nonprofit with 18 members.
Created and reviewed programming courses (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and technical articles for Programiz PRO (850K+ users) and Programiz.com (10M+ learners).

organization: Future of the Work Lab, Estonia (remote)
detail: Learned agile methodologies, intercultural communication, presentation skills, and design thinking, while co-developing a career guidance e-publication remotely with colleagues from different cultures, time zones, and countries.
